title: Favorites on Thanksgiving and Sunday Matchups | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
We recap the Rams-Buccaneers 'Monday Night Football' game that has us wondering if Tom Brady needs more sleep (3:00) before running through the three Thanksgiving Day games (28:00) and the slate of Sunday games that includes the Browns-Jaguars and Colts-Titans matchup (57:00).
Hosts: Warren Sharp and Joe House
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
